channel.title: PK points help
channel.description: How do i make a shop what sells items for PK points? Delta base

item.title: PK points help
item.dc:creator: @Zoft Zoft
item.description:
@Zoft wrote:

Rip one from one of the PK sources like Cammy PVP, or Edge PKz, as they are all known for that. Otherwise, you would have to copy the method that checks for GP and change that to checking for PVP points, then make it save to your char files and make it so when you kill someone you get the points. Iâ€™m not going to post everything you need to add it you should learn by trial and error, post your errors when you run into them.
